@jeannedesutun This, exactly. Easy to complain about this kind of thing when you're serviced by train, Luas and regular buses in Dublin.
Only need to look at UK to see deregulation doesn't work for public. Need over profit. (Morning rant from my Dublin Bus seat over.)
More broadly, isn't that ability to keep running unprofitable but necessary services the great benefit of state-owned transport?
